import React from 'react' import home1 from '../img/home1.png' import styled from 'styled-components' import {About, Description, Image, Hide} from '../styles' //Framer Motion import {motion} from 'framer-motion' const AboutSection = () => { const titleAnim ={ hidden: {opacity: 0}, show: {opacity: 1, transition: { duration: 2}} } return(
We work to make

your dreams come

true.

Contact us for any photography or videography ideas that you have. We have professionals with amazing skills to help you achieve it.

 ) } export default AboutSection;
